hint.metricDescription: The distribution of special code features relative to the code plays a role in the readability of code. This means that features should be periodically distributed evenly rather than only occurring at a certain point or wildly distributed in the code. In this case, the aim is to keep the line length if every line as equals as possible as this is generally more readable than very different line lengths
hint.goodCodeDescription: In this example, all lines of code are approximately the same length
hint.badCodeDescription: In this example, the lines of code have very different lengths
